member.name: EMRPLGBLT
member.summary: The EMRPLGBLT structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. Note that graphics device interface (GDI) converts the device-dependent bitmap into a device-independent bitmap (DIB) before storing it in the metafile record.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.rclBounds
member.summary: Bounding rectangle, in device units.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.aptlDest
member.summary: Array of three points in logical space that identify three corners of the destination parallelogram. The upper-left corner of the source rectangle is mapped to the first point in this array, the upper-right corner to the second point in this array, and the lower-left corner to the third point. The lower-right corner of the source rectangle is mapped to the implicit fourth point in the parallelogram.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.xSrc
member.summary: Logical x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.ySrc
member.summary: Logical y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.cxSrc
member.summary: Logical width of the source.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.cySrc
member.summary: Logical height of the source.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.xformSrc
member.summary: World-space to page-space transformation of the source device context.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.crBkColorSrc
member.summary: Background color (the RGB value) of the source device context. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.iUsageSrc
member.summary: Value of the bmiColors member of the structure. The iUsageSrc member can be either the DIB_PAL_COLORS or DIB_RGB_COLORS value.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.offBmiSrc
member.summary: Offset to source structure.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.cbBmiSrc
member.summary: Size of source structure.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.offBitsSrc
member.summary: Offset to source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.cbBitsSrc
member.summary: Size of source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.xMask
member.summary: Horizontal pixel offset into mask bitmap.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.yMask
member.summary: Vertical pixel offset into mask bitmap.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.iUsageMask
member.summary: Value of the bmiColors member of the mask structure.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.offBmiMask
member.summary: Offset to mask structure.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.cbBmiMask
member.summary: Size of mask structure.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.offBitsMask
member.summary: Offset to mask bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRPLGBLT.cbBitsMask
member.summary: Size of mask bitmap bits.
